attributes.review: Ok I’m not sure where to start but first I wanted to download this app to support or beloved and ongoing president but the app kept on crashing/lagging and being slow I have no clue if it’s just my phone or what but needs to improve.
attributes.title: To slow and laggy.

attributes.review: I downloaded it and i can no longer use my iphone. the people at tech support said it’s been happening to many who downloaded the app. i would NOT recommend this. i WILL be voting for biden due to this issue. thank you!
attributes.title: Horrible virus

attributes.review: Why get an app to vote for trump. Why even vote for trump? He’s a racist homophobic rapist. He’s gross. Tbh he needs to get a better spray tan. Honestly around his eyes are still white. How can you people even vote for him? Like 🤮. Trump, everyone deserves a chance at life 🥰🌺🧚‍♂️✨just not you ✨🧚‍♂️🌸😌
attributes.title: The worst way possible to advocate Trump2020

attributes.review: Good app to keep up with campaign events.
attributes.title: Trump for another 4 years!

attributes.review: My child took my phone and saw the screen of this app and jumped out the window. I WILL BE CALLING CORPORATE for this. Now I have to wear a mask because of this app. I am horrified. I am a VERY important person and the CEO of this app will be paying for the fee of my child and what I witnessed. DO NIT GET THIS!!
attributes.title: Don’t get this app- From Karen

attributes.review: I was looking forward to an AMAZING 👅👅🥰 app by mr Donny Trumpet but as soo as i opened the app my entire phone shut down because it sensed i was too “dark” to interact!!! Which CANT be true i bleach my skin 12 times a WEEK. Afterwards my dog stole my phone and took a MASSIVE poo on the scream then DIED 🦷🦷🦷, THis app is CURSED!! Trumpet is not longer my big man !! Nicki Minaj 2020!!
attributes.title: SAD!!!

attributes.review: I thought this was going to be a great app to use and then I started getting notifications with pictures of his face. I quickly became scared of his orange nasty looking face, I had to uninstall this. I now cannot sleep at night without being petrified of this man! 😔
attributes.title: Scarred for Life :(

attributes.review: i’m so disappointed by this app. the description had my hopes up so high but upon opening it and using the app, i was met with the worst experience of my life. as a republican and supporter of trump, i had higher standards. 😔😔 this app stole my v-card info and no one will help me get it back. i’ve tried filing reports but no one listens!! overall super disappointed that it stole my v card, hopefully i can find it again 😿 was this what you wanted, trump administration? 😾
attributes.title: feeling like trump after his tulsa rally

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and shut off and kept switching up my name and kept trying to make me pay for things i didn’t want please remove app from store before someone else’s phone gets a virus.
attributes.title: Yucky

attributes.review: I download the app to see how I can help🥰. And to see that it asked my credit card number and number I regretted it immediately. Well anyways... my boyfriend broke up with me so now I need to find someone to buy food 🎂for me when I mad. Plus he took me dog😤.
attributes.title: my dog died
